segments.text: Hello , I want to order an Easy-own package . What would you recommend ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Which function do you use more , making calls or sending short messages ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: About the same . But I'm looking for a job , so I have to answer the phone often .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Then I recommend this package to you . You can receive all the calls free by paying just 10 yuan a month .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's good . How can I order it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sending a message ' KTCTWY ' to 10086 will do .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you . I'll have a try .
segments.speaker: S1
